series_description: This series documents periodic reporting of affiliated foundations to the Board of Visitors as required by university policy. This series may include, but is not limited to: audit records, financial statements, tax forms, budgets, notification changes to articles of incorporation and by-laws, regular board and executive session meeting minutes.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of state fiscal year

series_title: Demand and Response Transportation (DART): Program Eligibility
series_description: This series documents the determination of eligibility for university-affiliated users of the Demand and Response Transportation (DART) program. This series may include, but not limited to: applications, correspondence, and lists.

retention_statement: 5 Years after superseded, obsolete, or rescinded
